name: Bright Minds Learning Center
shortDescription: Specialized coaching for children with dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds offers personalized programs for dyslexic learners using research-backed teaching strategies, one-on-one sessions, and a warm learning environment.

name: Focus First Institute
shortDescription: Empowering students with ADHD to thrive.
longDescription: Focus First uses behavior-based coaching techniques and collaborative strategies with parents and schools to improve attention, routine, and academic performance.

name: The Learning Tree
shortDescription: Inclusive therapies for children with ASD.
longDescription: Our multidisciplinary team offers speech, occupational, and behavioral therapy, emphasizing a structured and sensory-friendly environment.

name: ReadWell Center
shortDescription: Support for literacy and comprehension difficulties.
longDescription: ReadWellâ€™s programs are designed for students facing challenges in phonics, vocabulary, comprehension, and written expression using modern tools and assessments.

name: MindGrow Academy
shortDescription: Building planning, memory, and focus skills.
longDescription: MindGrow helps students improve organization, time management, and self-regulation through cognitive-behavioral strategies and tailored action plans.

name: SkillBridge Support Hub
shortDescription: A bridge to better learning outcomes.
longDescription: SkillBridge supports children with mild to moderate learning challenges, offering diagnostic evaluations, IEPs, and academic support across subjects.

name: ThinkSpace Clinic
shortDescription: For children with diverse learning profiles.
longDescription: ThinkSpace embraces neurodivergent learners with individualized support plans, mindfulness coaching, and inclusive educational strategies.
